collectible.title: Eichi's Tie
collectible.subtitle: Left behind by its owner, too frustrated when the game was over.
collectible.text: Part of the Yumenosaki Academy's uniform for 3rd years. A bit small and unremarkable, be careful not to forget it when you leave the Inventory! It's easy to leave it behind when you're thinking of something else.
collectible.unlock: Play a game where Eichi wins.

collectible.title: Pink Cardigan
collectible.subtitle: A gift inspired by something a friend of Eichi's wears a lot. Very cozy.
collectible.text: A brand new pink cardigan. Somewhat plain, even though there's a label with a designer brand on the inside of it. A gift from someone who has both good intentions and more money than sense.
collectible.unlock: Play a game with Eichi as a female player, at a background with a cold temperature. You don't necessarily have to win.
